title: The Way Los Angeles Is Trying to Solve Homelessness Is ‘Absolutely Insane’
description: Developing affordable housing projects shouldn’t make a miserable existence for those who’ve devoted their lives to it.
dc:creator: Ezra Klein
media:credit: Philip Cheung for The New York Times
media:description: Jeremiah Dean, near an encampment in the parking lot where the Venice Dell Community project may be built in Los Angeles. Mr. Dean is homeless and has been living in a tent in the parking lot for more than three months.
